code: export const toKebabCase = str => str && str.match(/[A-Z]{2,}(?=[A-Z][a-z]+[0-9]*|\b)|[A-Z]?[a-z]+[0-9]*|[0-9]+/g).map((x, index) => index === 0 ? x.toLowerCase() : x).join('-');

sourcesContent:
export const toKebabCase = (str) =>
  str &&
  str
    .match(/[A-Z]{2,}(?=[A-Z][a-z]+[0-9]*|\b)|[A-Z]?[a-z]+[0-9]*|[0-9]+/g)
    .map((x, index) => (index === 0 ? x.toLowerCase() : x))
    .join('-');
